entry.title: Klhip Classic Clipper Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Klhip
Type: Grooming Products - Nails
Price: 0.00

Everybody knows if you want the finest blades in the world, you go to Japan. So we did (just like we did for our Ultimate Clipper). And in the city of Seki, at the heart of the country, our Classic Clipper Set was born. Combining the precision of stainless steel with the comfort of molded plastic, this high quality set has a few tricks up its reinforced nylon sleeve. Hidden under the handle of each clipper you’ll find an integrated nail file, while behind the jaws lies a clever catchment system, to automatically catch your clippings

 

Classic Clipper Set Features

  • Traditional cut: For those who appreciate precision, but aren’t quite ready to go back-to-front.
  • Set of two: A straight-bladed toenail clipper and a curved-bladed fingernail clipper.
  • Clever details: Each clipper has an integrated nail file and automatic clipping catchment system.
  • Complementary materials: Stainless steel cutting edges are housed inside a comfortable molded plastic shell.

entry.title: Klhip Nail File
entry.summary:
Vendor: Klhip
Type: Grooming Products - Nails
Price: 0.00

Our Nail File is the ultimate tool for tidying your nails on the move. This rugged nail file is made from beautiful natural stone, carved from the Pyrenees Mountains in France. So each one has its own unique variations in pattern and tones. With two levels of coarseness and a natural tan leather case for easy transport, the Klhip Nail File is the best nail file around – and the last you'll ever need.

Klhip Nail File Features

  • Natural performance: Pyrenees Mountain stone offers a superior feel and unparalleled performance.
  • Two textures: Smooth on one side, coarse on the other, the textured surfaces won't wear out. We've even used them to sharpen a pocket knife.
  • Easy care: Wash with soap and warm water from time to time to keep your Klhip Nail File in peak condition.
  • Built to last: Natural stone ensures a nail file that will last. Take care not to drop it on hard surfaces though – it is stone after all. Klhip Guarantee.

entry.title: Klhip Combo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Klhip
Type: Grooming Products - Nails
Price: 0.00

The perfect combination of our award-winning Ultimate Clipper and our Natural Stone Nail File. Both in their own leather cases and packaged together in an eco, elegant and sturdy paper tube. For more specific details of each product included in this two-piece combination, please visit their respective product pages. The world’s first ergonomically correct nail clipper and our naturally rugged nail file, packaged together, is the ultimate combo.

 

Ultimate Clipper Features

  • Improved ergonomics: The forward facing lever applies pressure directly over the nail, giving you better control and a more comfortable grip.
  • Clean cut: Precision-engineered blades cut smoothly and accurately so there’s no need for filing and clippings stay on board.
  • Great action: Increased leverage makes for a superior cutting action and effortless clipping. You’ll be willing your nails to grow faster.
  • Built to last: Durable surgical stainless steel (440C) and world-class manufacturing produce the world’s best and highest quality nail clipper. Klhip Guarantee.

 

Klhip Nail File Features

  • Natural performance: Pyrenees Mountain stone offers a superior feel and unparalleled performance.
  • Two textures: Smooth on one side, coarse on the other, the textured surfaces won't wear out. We've even used them to sharpen a pocket knife.
  • Easy care: Wash with soap and warm water from time to time to keep your Klhip Nail File in peak condition.
  • Built to last: Natural stone ensures a nail file that will last. Take care not to drop it on hard surfaces though – it is stone after all. Klhip Guarantee.

entry.title: Klhip Ultimate Clipper
entry.summary:
Vendor: Klhip
Type: Grooming Products - Nails
Price: 0.00

The world’s first ergonomically correct nail clipper. That's right. All this time you've been doing it back-to-front. Our award-winning breakthrough in design gives you increased control and leverage as you trim your nails. Precision engineered from surgical grade stainless steel and with a handmade leather case, you'll want to show off your Klhip Ultimate Clipper almost as much as your tidy new nails. A great gift – even if it's to yourself. 

 

Ultimate Clipper Features

  • Improved ergonomics: The forward facing lever applies pressure directly over the nail, giving you better control and a more comfortable grip.
  • Clean cut: Precision-engineered blades cut smoothly and accurately so there’s no need for filing and clippings stay on board.
  • Great action: Increased leverage makes for a superior cutting action and effortless clipping. You’ll be willing your nails to grow faster.
  • Built to last: Durable surgical stainless steel (440C) and world-class manufacturing produce the world’s best and highest quality nail clipper. Klhip Guarantee.
